attributes.action: Remove the town of Bury from Greater Manchester and put it back in Lancashire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bury was once part of Lancashire until the boundaries were changed, and we were pushed into Greater Manchester. There are many many people who were, and still are not happy about this. We are and always will be proud Lancastrians. A great many of Bury's residents still use Lancashire as part of their address. So it makes sense to return it to where it belongs.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
